title: Sell Adelphi Whisky
metaTitle: Sell Adelphi Whisky | Selection & Fascadale | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your Adelphi Selection whisky. We buy rare single casks from Scotland's most acclaimed independent bottler.
heroSubhead: Direct buyer for Adelphi Selection and Ardnamurchan special releases.
introParagraph: Adelphi is renowned for an uncompromising selection process. They only bottle the absolute top tier of casks, making the 'Adelphi Selection' label a guarantee of quality.
whatWeBuy: Adelphi Breath of the Isles / Highlands
photoChecklist: Back label showing Bottle # and Outturn
conditionFactors: Label Style: The 'Dancey Man' logo is iconic. Check for label scuffs.
Cask Details: Adelphi lists full cask history. Verify details.
Seal: Plastic capsules on older bottlings can crack.
Box: Standard card boxes are less critical than the bottle condition.
pricingFactors: Distillery: Adelphi Bunnahabhain, Clynelish, and Bowmore are top market movers.
Age: 25+ year old Adelphis are highly coveted.
Fusion: 'The Glover' (Japanese/Scotch hybrid) has a specific collector following.
Color: Dark sherry bombs from Adelphi command premiums.

faqs.question: Do you buy Ardnamurchan?
faqs.answer: Yes, Adelphi owns Ardnamurchan. We buy the single casks and special releases (e.g., Paul Launois).

faqs.question: What is 'Fascadale'?
faqs.answer: A batch release series (usually Highland Park). We buy it.

faqs.question: What is 'Liddesdale'?
faqs.answer: A batch release series (usually Bunnahabhain). We buy it.

faqs.question: Do you buy The Brisbane?
faqs.answer: Yes, fusion whiskies are of interest.

faqs.question: Why is my Adelphi worth so much?
faqs.answer: Adelphi has a cult reputation for quality. Demand outstrips supply.

faqs.question: Do you buy Limpyd?
faqs.answer: Yes, the vintage Adelphi 'Limpyd' releases are rare.
